name: Egyptian Captivity
short: Israel enslaved in Egypt until the Exodus under Moses.

name: Assyrian Captivity
short: Northern Kingdom exiled by Assyria; 8th century BCE.

name: Babylonian Captivity
short: Judah exiled to Babylon; temple destroyed.

name: Roman Captivity & Dispersion
short: Roman rule; Temple destroyed 70 AD; Bar Kokhba revolt 135 AD.
